devdoc.details: Adapted from the recommended implementation of a Proxy in EIP-1822, updated for solc 0.6.12, and using the EIP-1967 storage slot for the proxiable implementation. See: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1822 See: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1967
devdoc.title: GlobalConfigProxy Contract

userdoc.notice: A proxy contract for global configuration, slightly modified from EIP-1822
